entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
